participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Maya is energetic and enjoys outdoor activities, particularly with her dog. She has a creative side, often expressing herself through dance, but is also analytical due to her chemistry background.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ethan is imaginative and curious, often fascinated by the world around him. He has a playful spirit and uses humor to cope with challenges in his life.
participant_2.background: i'm a boy. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i was born with my heart outside my body.
